loginPage_credentialsFieldIcon.title: LoginPage: When either username or password field is empty, the appropriate field should be highlighted and contain error icon
loginPage_credentialsFieldIcon.description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the Login page; 2. Leave the Username or Password field empty and click on Login button; 3. Verify that both fields are highlighted with red color and have error icon.

headerComp_ResetAppState.title: Header: Reset App State option should reset the state of Remove button on the added Cards
headerComp_ResetAppState.description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Add a card to the cart; 2. Click on Reset App State option; 3. Verify that the Remove buttons are not changed back to Add buttons.

backtraceApi_UnauthorizedError.title: HTTP 401 Unauthorized Error on Backtrace API Requests
backtraceApi_UnauthorizedError.description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Trigger an event in the application that should be reported to Backtrace; 2. Observe the network requests in the browser's developer tools; 3. Verify that the POST requests to the Backtrace API endpoints fail with a 401 Unauthorized error.

footerComp_TermsOfServiceLink.title: Footer: Terms of Service link should be implemented
footerComp_TermsOfServiceLink.description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the Inventory page; 2. Scroll down to the footer; 3. Verify that the Terms of Service link is not displayed.

footerComp_PrivacyPolicyLink.title: Footer: Privacy Policy link should be implemented
footerComp_PrivacyPolicyLink.description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the Inventory page; 2. Scroll down to the footer; 3. Verify that the Privacy Policy link is not displayed.

footerComp_OutdatedTwitterLink.title: Footer: Outdated Twitter link should be updated
footerComp_OutdatedTwitterLink.description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the Inventory page; 2. Scroll down to the footer; 3. Verify that the Twitter link points to the outdated URL. The actual: https://x.com/saucelabs

inventoryPage_cardTitleNotValidated.title: InventoryPage.Card: Incorrect Product Title Displayed
inventoryPage_cardTitleNotValidated.description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the Inventory page; 2. Verify the product titles displayed on the product cards; 3. Observe that the title 'Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)' is not validated.

inventoryPage_cardDescriptionNotValidate.title: InventoryPage.Card: Incorrect Product Description Displayed
inventoryPage_cardDescriptionNotValidate.description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the Inventory page; 2. Verify the product descriptions displayed on the product cards; 3. Observe that the description 'carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection.' is not validated.

cartPage_EmptyCartCheckout.title: CartPage: Checkout button should be disabled when the cart is empty
cartPage_EmptyCartCheckout.description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the Cart page without added products; 2. Verify that the Checkout button is disabled when the cart is empty.

checkoutOverviewPage_FloatingPointPrecis.title: Floating-Point Precision Errors in Price Calculations Causing Test Failures
checkoutOverviewPage_FloatingPointPrecis.description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Calculate a sum of product prices using JavaScript's addition operations; 2. Compare the calculated sum with an expected value; 3. Observe that values like 79.94999999999999 and 79.95 fail equality checks despite appearing identical when displayed.
